item.title: Amaretto Sour
item.description: Ingredients 1.5oz amaretto liqueur 0.75oz bourbon (optional) 1oz lemon juice 1tsp simple syrup 1/2 oz egg white (approx 1/2 an egg) 2 cocktail cherries lemon wheel or twist (optional garnish) Directions Combine amaretto, bourbon, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white in shake. Pre-shake for 15sec with no-ice. Gently release pressure from the shaker. Add ice to shaker and shake for 15sec. Strain into glass over fresh ice. Add cherries and lemon garnish.
